src.clf.create_data module¶

Description:

Loading data and transforming data to the format that can be used by the classifier.

Main function

src.clf.create_data.replace_tab(x: list[str]) → list[str]¶

Replace space with underscore

Parameters:

x (list[str]) – List of words separated by space

Returns:

List of words concatenated by underscore

Return type:

list[str]

Transform column to list

Parameters:

  • df (pd.DataFrame) – dataframe with labels and NLP features

  • column_name (str) – column name

Returns:

dataframe with transformed column

Return type:

pd.DataFrame
